title: Tech Time
text:
Warning



This site is very much a work in progress!
This is the homepage of the Melbourne Data Analytics Platform Tech Time group.
We meet fortnightly to share our knowledge and experience with software, techniques, and tools. This site collects together the slides, content and resources presented each meeting.

coding

title: MDAP Tech Time
text:
This is the source code for the tech time website.
It is rendered and published using Quarto. The general workflow is:

Create a new Tech Time session in /sessions. If you are just adding a single page with no assets (i.e. are adding no images etc. to the repo) then you can just create a single .qmd file with the content. If you are adding a page with assets, then create a new directory in /sessions and add an index.qmd file to it. See /sessions/why-rust/index.qmd for an example.
Add the required metadata as yaml frontmatter to your .qmd file. The minimum requirements are:


title
date (should be the date of your Tech Time session)
description
categories


Use quarto preview and have a good look to make sure your new content looks right and that it is listed on the homepage.
Publish the site using quarto publish gh-pages

Please see the Quarto documentation for further details. In particular note the the ability to publish Python, R, Julia, and Javascript notebooks with interactive output! It’s awesome!
If you have any questions or problems then please contact Simon M.
